description:
Changelog (25/05/24):

* Fixed Favorites Appending Oldest to Newest.

* Added Page Header Icon (Archive.org Logo).

* Added Warning Messages About Retricted Files.

* Fixed File Names Including the Folder Title.

* Added Donation Prompt for Archive.org Team.
author: F0R3V3R50F7
title: Internet Archive
synopsis: Search, Save & Stream Videos / Audio from Archive.org | Donate to Archive.org if you can (Preservation of History is Important).
